sen.j: 藤原 百川（ふじわら の ももかわ、天平4年（732年） - 宝亀10年7月9日 (旧暦)（779年8月28日））は奈良時代の政治家。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Momokawa (732 - August 28, 779) was a statesman in the Nara period.
FUJIWARA no Momokawa (732 - August 28, 779) was a statesman in the Nara period.

sen.j: 藤原式家藤原宇合の八男。
sen.e: He was a son of FUJIWARA no Umakai who was from the Ceremonial House of the Fujiwara clan.
He was the eighth son of FUJIWARA no Umakai who was from the Ceremonial House of the Fujiwara clan.
sen.cmt: 八男の表現が抜けていました。
sen.e: He was the eighth son of FUJIWARA no Umakai who was from the Ceremonial House of the Fujiwara clan.

sen.j: 藤原広嗣らの弟。
sen.e: He was a younger brother of FUJIWARA no Hirotsugu.

sen.j: 初めは「雄田麻呂」と名乗る。
sen.e: He was originally called "Odamaro".

sen.j: 孝謙天皇代にあって、藤原仲麻呂の乱以後後退していた藤原氏をその才覚により支え権力の再興を果たす。
sen.e: During the era of Empress Koken, using his wits, he supported and restored the Fujiwara clan which suffered setbacks after the Rebellion of Fujiwara no Nakamaro.
During the era of Empress Koken, he supported and restored the Fujiwara clan by using his wits, who had lost their authority after the Rebellion of Fujiwara no Nakamaro.

sen.e: During the era of Empress Koken, he supported and restored the Fujiwara clan by using his wits, who had lost their authority after the Rebellion of Fujiwara no Nakamaro.

sen.j: 神護景雲3年（769年）の宇佐八幡宮神託事件においても、藤原永手らとはかり皇位継承阻止派として百川の暗躍があったといわれる。
sen.e: It is said that Momokawa worked behind the scenes of the plot of Usa Hachiman-gu oracle in 769, working with FUJIWARA no Nagate as a group of stopping the succession to the Imperial Throne.
It is said that Momokawa worked behind the scenes of the plot of Usa Hachiman-gu oracle in 769 by working with FUJIWARA no Nagate to stop the succession to the Imperial Throne.
sen.cmt: コンマをbyに、 as a group of stopping the succession を to stop the successionに訂正しました。
sen.e: It is said that Momokawa worked behind the scenes of the plot of Usa Hachiman-gu oracle in 769 by working with FUJIWARA no Nagate to stop the succession to the Imperial Throne.

sen.j: そのころの百川は、表向きは内豎大輔として称徳天皇・道鏡政権の中枢に参加する一方で、神託事件によって配流された和気清麻呂のために秘かに仕送りを続ける（『百川伝』）など、激動する政界において巧みに振舞ってきた。
sen.e: At that time, Momokawa cleverly acted in a changing political world such as continuing sending money secretly to WAKE no Kiyomaro who was exiled for the plot of the oracle ("Momokawa den [the biography of Momokawa]"), while he was officially at the center of the administration of Emperor Shotoku and Dokyo as Naiju no Taifu (Senior Assistant Minister of Royal Pages).

sen.j: 宝亀元年（770年）称徳天皇が皇嗣を定めないまま崩御した際、右大臣吉備真備らの反対をおして、兄藤原良継とともに、光仁天皇を擁立。
sen.e: After Emperor Shotoku passed away without selecting Crown Prince in 770, he worked together with FUJIWARA no Yoshitsugu to enthrone Emperor Konin, overcoming the opposition from parties including KIBI no Makibi, Udaijin (Minister of the Right).

After Emperor Shotoku passed away without selecting Crown Prince in 770, he worked together with his brother FUJIWARA no Yoshitsugu to enthrone Emperor Konin by overcoming the opposition from parties including Udaijin (Minister of the Right) KIBI no Makibi.

sen.j: これは、壬申の乱以来絶えていた天智天皇系の復活であり、光仁天皇には望外であったと想定される。
sen.e: This was the resurrection of the emperor descended from Emperor Tenchi who had been discontinued since the Jinshin War, and is thought to have been unexpected for Emperor Konin.

sen.e: Therefore, he gained the strong trust of the Emperor and played an important role.

sen.e: Around that time, he changed his name to Momokawa.

sen.j: 宝亀3年（772年）、井上内親王（称徳妹）が呪詛疑惑により皇后を廃され、子他戸親王も廃太子となった。
sen.e: In 772, Imperial Princess Inoe (Dokyo's sister) was deprived of Empress for suspicion of curse and then her son, Imperial Prince Osabe became the deposed Crown Prince.
